name: Tetris?
description:
Tetris... in puzzlescript!? Yes.

Why? Just to see if it's possible. Turns out it is! See the code here: 

https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=5b12ac7eb7ad94a8c267ff89811df59c

There's nothing official about this release, it's a demo at best. For the real deal, I suggest you visit here: https://tetris.com/
